attributes.action: Independent scrutiny for the PM's failure to uphold Ministerial code
attributes.additional_details:
When the PM became Leader of the Conservative Party and PM he set out his his objectives in terms of conduct
However this process is overseen by him, specifically a mechanism needs to be put in place whereby he himself is held accountable for these high standards
attributes.background: The PM is the arbiter of conduct of Ministers in relation to the  Code. However no such mechanism exists to oversee the conduct of the PM in relation to him breaking the Code. We request an independent scrutiny Committee for this purpose. He should not be absolved of the process he set out in 2019

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/589775
